# File bug report

Execute the **bug** workflow as a **QA Engineer**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_QA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_QA.md)

## Quick Reference

File a bug report:
1. Capture bug details
2. Document reproduction steps
3. Classify severity
4. Link to affected feature
5. Create bug file in bugs/ folder
